summary: The mod makes the world seem a little more realistic, some visual bugfixes for Bethesda and some new stuff.
descriptionHtml:
ATM i'am working on a new Island.


[b][size=3]BETA v0.302[/size][/b]

My village is completed to 65%.
Only the final NavMesh and some exteriors/interiors must be completed. In addition, some NPC are missing.


[b][size=3]I uploaded the file as a BETA-Version![/size][/b]


If someone knows, how to script a teleport (with follower) Papyrus with dialogue for a boatsmen, like in the DLC's to a new island, send a Message to me via Forum :)


[size=3][b][u]New in the BETA:[/u][/b]
[/size]
- [b]New House[/b] with a little dungeon (between "Wreck of the Brinchammer" and "Wreck of the Icerunner" at the coastline. The key is in front of the house at the big stone under a pot)
- [b]New Island[/b] (you can travel with "coc Kundjiza" to the not finished Island (only some navmesh inside and outside the buildings and only one village atm.))
- [b]New[/b] craftable [b]Greater Ebony Armor and Weapons[/b] with the Dragonbone Armor/Weapon Stats (if you don't have the DLC for the Weapons ;) )
- Some [b]visual Bugfixes[/b]
- Beta only in German, sorry for that, but dont want to translate the Beta :)




In this basic modification, your forests filled with trees, conifers and houses,
mountains filled with more gravel, rivers are more realistic (not empty anymore),
some visual bugfixes for Bethesda and new small adventures

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b][u][size=4]Instructions:
[/size][/u][/b]
Choose your language (german/english)

[b][u][size=4]NMM:
[/size][/u][/b]
Download with NMM and activate the file.


[b][u][size=4]Manual:
[/size][/u][/b]
Copy the *.esp file and textures folder into your "???.Steam.SteamApps.common.skyrim.Data" folder.

Activate in your launcher "AoG BetterWorld.esp", now start the game and enjoy.


[b][u][size=4]-RECOMMENDED-
[/size][/u][/b]AFTER INSTALLATION!

For best results use [b][url=http://loot.github.io]LOOT[/url][/b] to sort your Mods for best performance and optimisations.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b][u][size=4]Known bugs atm:
[/size][/u][/b]- nothing

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b][u][size=4]Maybe in future versions:
[/size][/u][/b]
- better landscape view (WIP)
- visual bugfixes (WIP)
- new Island (WIP)
- craftable scroll spells
- more Quest (don't know how to create a working quest atm)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b][size=3]v0.302[/size][/b] - 2014/07/05
- many changes (lights and much more!)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If someone want to translate this mod into other languages than german or english,
Credit me and link to my Mod in the [b]first description line[/b]!
Also is my version number even yours.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b][u][size=3]Mods in the Pictures:
[/size][/u][/b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1111]Pure Waters[/url] by [b]Laast[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/141]Flora Overhaul[/url] by [b]vurt[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/607]Skyrim HD - 2K[/url] by [b]NebuLa[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30450]Realistic Lighting[/url] by [b]The Realistic Lighting Team[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30936]RealVision ENB[/url] by [b]SkyrimTuner[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31052]Better World[/url] by [b]Wurstkrieger[/b]


This is my first project, please give me a chance.


[size=5][u][b]FOR MODDERS:

[/b][/u][/size]You can use my MOD in Mod compilations or as a resource for your Mod, you only need to Credit me at the Modsite and/or in the mod.
author: Wurstkrieger
